channel.title: Possible to define "face" for each door?

item.title: Possible to define "face" for each door?
item.dc:creator: @Mmm1 Mmm.
item.description:
@Mmm1 wrote:

I’m trying to make 1 major code so that I don’t have to program each door individually (I’ve coded 78 doors so far) but when I try the following base code:

				if (objectID == 1531 && face == -3)
				{
				ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,objectID, -4);
				ReplaceObject(objectX-1,objectY,objectID, -2);
				}
				if (objectID == 1531 && face == -2)
				{
				ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,objectID, -4);
				ReplaceObject(objectX+1,objectY,objectID, -3);
				}
				if (objectID == 1531 && face == -1)
				{
				ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,objectID, -4);
				ReplaceObject(objectX-1,objectY,objectID, 0);
				}
				if (objectID == 1531 && face == 0)
				{
				ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,objectID, -4);
				ReplaceObject(objectX+1,objectY,objectID, -1);
				}

…it only does the last code because the int “face” equals 0. Is there a code I could do to preload the face value for every object?

Read full topic
item.source: Possible to define "face" for each door?
